column1: | MD130 WATFORD JUNCTION TO ST ALBANS ABBEY                                                                        |                 |                                    |
| See entry under route MD101 Euston to Armitage Jn (exclusive)                                                    |                 |                                    |
| Dwell Time                                                                                                       |                 | 1 (applies in Down direction only) |
| Minimum Turnround Time – Trains changing direction at end of journey                                             |                 |                                    |
| MD137 HARLESDEN JN TO WEMBLEY CENTRAL (WEMBLEY YARD LINES)                                                       |                 |                                    |
| Trains to/from HLG or REV line codes must travel via ‘track code’ numbers 1 or HLG                               |                 |                                    |
| Trains to/from PRDC must travel via ‘track code’’ numbers 1-4                                                    |                 |                                    |
| Trains to/from Willesden OTM Sidings must travel via ‘track code’ number 4                                       |                 |                                    |
| Reception Line No 1 must not be used for stabling trains. It needs to be kept free for run round movements,      |                 |                                    |
| attaching and detaching, and for access to the loco sidings from the North. No train should be planned to occupy |                 |                                    |
| Reception Line 1 for greater than 60 minutes.                                                                    |                 |                                    |
| MD140 BLETCHLEY TO BEDFORD ST JOHNS (INCLUSIVE)                                                                  |                 |                                    |
| See entry under route MD101 Euston to Armitage Jn (exclusive)                                                    |                 |                                    |
